subject: Baseball
Pilots
lead_paragraph: Cory Lidle, who has been a major league pitcher for nine years and a pilot for seven months, is 3-2 with a 3.38 earned run average in six starts with the Yankees.
snippet: Cory Lidle, who has been a major league pitcher for nine years and a pilot for seven months, is 3-2 with a 3.38 earned run average in six starts with the Yankees.
